name: pump.io
author: Evan Prodromou <evan@e14n.com>
description: Social server with an ActivityStreams API

scripts.fullbuild: npm run build && echo 'use `npm run build` instead next time' 1>&2
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:vows
scripts.test:systemd: docker run -v $(pwd):/tmp/pump.io:ro -v $NVM_DIR:/.nvm:ro ubuntu sh -c "export NVM_DIR=$NVM_DIR; . $NVM_DIR/nvm.sh; nvm use $TRAVIS_NODE_VERSION; cd /tmp/pump.io; npm run test:systemd:run"
scripts.test:systemd:run: mkdir -p /tmp/pump.io/uploads; sed 's/%i.service//g' pump.io@.service | sudo tee /etc/systemd/system/pump.io.service; sudo systemctl daemon-reload; sudo systemctl start pump.io.service; npm run test:system
scripts.lint: npm run lint:jshint && npm run lint:jscs && npm run lint:jade && npm run lint:json && npm run lint:deps
scripts.lint:deps: dependency-check package.json bin/* test/*.js > /dev/null && dependency-check --unused package.json -i dependency-check -i jscs -i jshint -i jsonlint -i pug-lint -i nyc -i lcov-result-merger -i coveralls bin/* test/*.js > /dev/null
scripts.lint:jshint: jshint --exclude 'public/javascript/libs' bin/* lib routes public/javascript test
scripts.lint:jscs: jscs bin/* lib public/javascript/pump* routes test
scripts.update-docs: for doc in copyright manpage readme; do npm run update-docs:$doc; done
scripts.update-docs:copyright: for i in README.md doc/pump.1; do sed -E "s/2011-20[[:digit:]]{2}/2011-$(date +%Y)/g" $i | sponge $i; done
scripts.update-docs:manpage: sed "s/^\.TH PUMP 1.*$/.TH PUMP 1 \"$(date +'%d %B %Y')\" \"$npm_package_version\"/" doc/pump.1 | sponge doc/pump.1
scripts.version: npm run version:check-branch && npm run update-docs && git add README.md doc/
scripts.version:check-branch: if [ "$(git symbolic-ref HEAD)" = refs/heads/master ]; then echo 'refusing to run `npm version` on master; bump package.json manually' 1>&2; exit 1; fi
scripts.postversion:push: git push origin v$npm_package_version && npm run --silent util:is-beta || git push --set-upstream origin $(git symbolic-ref --short HEAD)
